item.description:
Friday night at O'Neills in Salem - listen to some live Irish music by John Rockwell and friends, enjoy a pint of Bass or Guiness and dinner, perhaps, and meet new friends from Britain and Europe! (Or maybe we could go for an Indian meal after having a drink...) NOTE CHANGE OF TIME TO 7.30 PM, will give you a little more time to get there..

O'Neills is a friendly pub and restaurant with traditional pub-like atmosphere especially in the earlier part of the evening. It's pretty easy to park on the street outside or on one of the side streets (eg. Essex St).

http://www.oneillsofs...
item.how_to_find_us: Red scarf, table near the front of the pub
item.name: North Shore Brits & Euros Singles Friday night out
